verses.verse: לְ֭כוּ <S%H1980><s%> Le-chu come נְרַנְּנָ֣ה <S%H7442><s%> ne-ran-ne-Nah let us sing לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; unto the LORD נָ֝רִ֗יעָה <S%H7321><s%> na-Ri-'ah, let us make a joyful noise לְצ֣וּר <S%H6697><s%> le-Tzur to the rock יִשְׁעֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3468><s%> yish-'E-nu. of our salvation

נְקַדְּמָ֣ה <S%H6923><s%> ne-kad-de-Mah Let us come פָנָ֣יו <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nav before his presence בְּתוֹדָ֑ה <S%H8426><s%> be-to-Dah; with thanksgiving בִּ֝זְמִר֗וֹת <S%H2158><s%> biz-mi-Rot, unto him with psalms נָרִ֥יעַֽ <S%H7321><s%> na-Ri-a' and make a joyful noise לֽוֹ׃ lo.

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for אֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> 'el God גָּד֣וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol [is] a great יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; For the LORD וּמֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> u-Me-lech King גָּ֝ד֗וֹל <S%H1419><s%> ga-Dol, and a great עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- above כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him. above all gods

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whose בְּ֭יָדוֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-do In his hand מֶחְקְרֵי־ <S%H4278><s%> mech-ke-rei- [are] the deep places אָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz; of the earth וְתוֹעֲפ֖וֹת <S%H8443><s%> ve-to-'a-Fot the strength הָרִ֣ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim of the hills לֽוֹ׃ lo.

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after ל֣וֹ lo הַ֭יָּם <S%H3220><s%> Hai-yom The sea וְה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu who עָשָׂ֑הוּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sa-hu; [is] his and he made וְ֝יַבֶּ֗שֶׁת <S%H3006><s%> ve-yab-Be-shet, the dry יָדָ֥יו <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dav it and his hands יָצָֽרוּ׃ <S%H3335><s%> ya-Tza-ru. formed

בֹּ֭אוּ <S%H935><s%> Bo-'u O come נִשְׁתַּחֲוֶ֣ה <S%H7812><s%> nish-ta-cha-Veh let us worship וְנִכְרָ֑עָה <S%H3766><s%> ve-nich-Ra-'ah; and bow down נִ֝בְרְכָ֗ה <S%H1288><s%> niv-re-Chah, let us kneel לִֽפְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei- before יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD עֹשֵֽׂנוּ׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Se-nu. our maker

כִּ֘י <S%H3588><s%> ki for ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu, For he [is] our God וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ <S%H587><s%> va-'a-Nach-nu we עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am and we [are] the people מַ֭רְעִיתוֹ <S%H4830><s%> mar-'i-to of his pasture וְצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> ve-Tzon and the sheep יָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do; of his hand הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom, To day אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- if בְּקֹל֥וֹ <S%H6963><s%> be-ko-Lo his voice תִשְׁמָֽעוּ׃ <S%H8085><s%> tish-Ma-'u. if ye will hear

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not תַּקְשׁ֣וּ <S%H7185><s%> tak-Shu Harden לְ֭בַבְכֶם <S%H3824><s%> Le-vav-chem not your heart כִּמְרִיבָ֑ה <S%H4808><s%> kim-ri-Vah; as in the provocation כְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> ke-Yom [and] as [in] the day מַ֝סָּ֗ה <S%H4531><s%> mas-Sah, of temptation בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <S%H4057><s%> bam-mid-Bar. in the wilderness

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher When נִ֭סּוּנִי <S%H5254><s%> Nis-su-ni tempted אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-tei-Chem; When your fathers בְּ֝חָנ֗וּנִי <S%H974><s%> be-cha-Nu-ni, me proved גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- though רָא֥וּ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'U me and saw פָעֳלִֽי׃ <S%H6467><s%> fo-'o-Li. my work

אַרְבָּ֘עִ֤ים <S%H705><s%> 'ar-Ba-'Im Forty שָׁנָ֨ה׀ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years אָ֘ק֤וּט <S%H6962><s%> 'a-Kut long was I grieved בְּד֗וֹר <S%H1755><s%> be-Dor, with [this] generation וָאֹמַ֗ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar, and said עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am It [is] a people תֹּעֵ֣י <S%H8582><s%> to-'Ei that do err לֵבָ֣ב <S%H3824><s%> le-Vav in their heart הֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> Hem; like וְ֝הֵ֗ם <S%H1992><s%> ve-Hem, like לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not יָדְע֥וּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U and they have not known דְרָכָֽי׃ <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Chai. my ways

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- Therefore נִשְׁבַּ֥עְתִּי <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba'-ti Unto whom I sware בְאַפִּ֑י <S%H639><s%> ve-'ap-Pi; in my wrath אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- Truly יְ֝בֹא֗וּן <S%H935><s%> ye-vo-'Un, that they should not enter אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into מְנוּחָתִֽי׃ <S%H4496><s%> me-nu-cha-Ti. into my rest
